title: What to Know: Texas Tech Spring Game - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: What to Know: Texas Tech Spring Game - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Fans will get their first glimpse of the Red Raiders under new head coach Joey McGuire on Saturday when Texas Tech hosts its annual Spring Game inside Jones AT&T Stadium. Kickoff is slated for 12:30 p.m. with television coverage provided nationally via Big 12 Now on ESPN+.
